title.rendered: IT – Technology Lead | Microservices | Microservices API Management

content.rendered:
Qualifications Basic:Bachelor s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution. Will also consider three years of progressive experience in the specialty in lieu of every year of education.
At least 6+ years of industry experience
Technical expertise
Primary Skills:3-4 years experience and Expertise in Java with Spring/Spring Boot framework.
2-3 years experience and Expertise in designing and developing NoSQL with Cassandra.
2-3 years managing and administering Cassandra Clusters.
1-2 Years of experience in setting up Elastic Search Clusters for scalability and able to navigate challenges on Elastic Search.
1-2 years of Experience in any messaging solution like Kafka
2-3 years of experience building and scaling Enterprise Grade Cassandra and Kafka Infrastructure.
1-2 years of Experience in provisioning services with Amazon web service
Working knowledge on AWS VPC, EC2, S3 and EMR.
2 years experience in designing / building solution with microservice architecture
1-2 years in Writing complex/ optimized queries using Cassandra Query Language
Capability to develop PoCs with Cassandra in terms of creating like Data lake / Data pond
Expert in Recommending Best Practices in setting up Cassandra and in data manipulations on Cassandra
Agile Process, Knowledge of JIRA.
Manage and deploy micro services to multiple cloud platforms.
Familiar with latest trends in industry from technology and domain standpoint
Experience and good understanding of IT SDLC lifecycle phases.
Thorough understanding of AGILE principles and practices
Strong business process/system analytical skills
Creative, innovative and be able to work in a fast-paced environment
Demonstrated client facing skills,
Excellent oral, written communication and presentation skills with ability to interact with technical and functional staff
Technical design experience in transforming and developing requirements into functional / technical design
Team Player
Preferred:At least 6 years of experience in Skills
At least 6 years of experience in software development life cycle.
At least 6 years of experience in Project life cycle activities on development and maintenance projects.
At least 6 years of experience in Design & Review.
Experience and desire to work in a Global delivery environment.
